page.title: 04Games we play.
page.content: Blind fold walks British Bulldog Broomyard school Cable cars Cat's got measles Chainy Conkers Donkey Down on one knee Froggy Hop scotch Hot chocolate Juggernauts & buses Kiss chase Line tig Orange balls Poddy Poisonous letter Pretend games Queenie Ragdale hall Red rovers Scout style British Bulldog Stuck in the mud Bad eggs {Ragdale Hall, RULES:-}You need a hairdresser, a receptionist, two shopkeepers and two visitors. After paying,visitors go to their rooms to change then take some exercise before having a sauna or a swim.They can buy some leisurewear at the boutique and have various beauty treatments. {Ragdale Hall,}a local "health farm."
